channel.title: Daily Tech News Show
channel.itunes:author: Tom Merritt
channel.itunes:summary: Daily Tech News Show features host Tom Merrit and various guests discussing featured news stories from the world of tech.

item.title: DTNS 2239 – GlennScary Git Hub
item.itunes:summary: Josh Ong joins us today to talk about the Secret app coming to Android, and the secret of Lenovo’s success selling PCs. Will the US government ruin it for them?
